text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Agricultural land" means real property that is or was assessed on the basis of farm or agricultural use under § 8-209 of this article.

section.section: "Agricultural land transfer tax" means the tax imposed under this subtitle.
"Agricultural land transfer tax" includes the surcharge imposed under § 13-303(d) of this subtitle.
"Total value" means the value of the property as stated in the most recent assessment roll.
"Total value" includes any adjustment in the value of improvements that result from an increase in construction costs as determined by the Department as of the most recent date of finality.
